description.native_language: Deliver a bottle of water to Lina at the Village Entrance.
description.target_language: Entregar una botella de agua a Lina en la Entrada del Pueblo.

description.native_language: Gather water from the Village Entrance.
description.target_language: Recoge agua en la Entrada del Pueblo.

description.native_language: Deliver the water to Lina.
description.target_language: Entrega el agua a Lina.

quest_offer.native_language: Could you deliver this water to Lina?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Podrías entregar esta agua a Lina?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for the delivery!

description.native_language: Ask around to find information about the Rainbow Pond.
description.target_language: Pregunta para encontrar información sobre el Estanque Arcoíris.

description.native_language: Talk to Pablo about the Rainbow Pond.
description.target_language: Habla con Pablo sobre el Estanque Arcoíris.

description.native_language: Learn about the Rainbow Pond from Tina.
description.target_language: Aprende sobre el Estanque Arcoíris de Tina.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you find out more about the Rainbow Pond?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes averiguar más sobre el Estanque Arcoíris?

quest_complete.native_language: Great, now I know about the Rainbow Pond!
quest_complete.target_language: ¡Genial, ahora sé sobre el Estanque Arcoíris!

description.native_language: Persuade Carmen to join the village festival.
description.target_language: Convence a Carmen para que se una al festival del pueblo.

description.native_language: Talk to Carmen about joining the festival.
description.target_language: Habla con Carmen sobre unirse al festival.

description.native_language: Convince Carmen with a polite request.
description.target_language: Convence a Carmen con una petición educada.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you persuade Carmen to join our festival?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes convencer a Carmen para que se una a nuestro festival?

quest_complete.native_language: Carmen has agreed to join, thank you!

description.native_language: Gather supplies from Luminara Market for Miguel.
description.target_language: Recoge suministros del Mercado de Luminara para Miguel.

description.native_language: Go to Luminara Market to purchase cheese.
description.target_language: Ve al Mercado de Luminara para comprar queso.

description.native_language: Return to Miguel with the cheese.
description.target_language: Regresa a Miguel con el queso.

quest_offer.native_language: I need cheese from the market, can you help?
quest_offer.target_language: Necesito queso del mercado, ¿puedes ayudar?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for bringing the cheese!

description.native_language: Deliver herbal tea to Elena at the Herbalist's Hut.
description.target_language: Entrega té de hierbas a Elena en la Cabaña del Herbolario.

description.native_language: Purchase herbal tea from the Herbalist's Hut.
description.target_language: Compra té de hierbas en la Cabaña del Herbolario.

description.native_language: Deliver the herbal tea to Elena.
description.target_language: Entrega el té de hierbas a Elena.

quest_offer.native_language: Could you deliver this herbal tea to Elena?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Podrías entregar este té de hierbas a Elena?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for the delivery!

description.native_language: Deliver a bottle of water to Lina.
description.target_language: Entrega una botella de agua a Lina.

description.native_language: Collect water at the Village Entrance.
description.target_language: Recoge agua en la entrada del pueblo.

description.native_language: Deliver the water to Lina.
description.target_language: Entrega el agua a Lina.

quest_offer.native_language: Could you take this water to Lina?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Podrías llevar esta agua a Lina?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for delivering the water.

description.native_language: Find out the latest news in Luminara Town Square.
description.target_language: Descubre las últimas noticias en la Plaza de Luminara.

description.native_language: Talk to Tomas the Elder for news.
description.target_language: Habla con Tomás el Anciano para recibir noticias.

description.native_language: Return to Miguel with the news.
description.target_language: Regresa a Miguel con las noticias.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you find out what's happening in the square?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes averiguar qué está pasando en la plaza?

quest_complete.native_language: Thanks for bringing me the news!

description.native_language: Buy cheese and bring it to Elena at the inn.
description.target_language: Compra queso y llévalo a Elena en la posada.

description.native_language: Go to Luminara Market to buy cheese.
description.target_language: Ve al mercado de Luminara a comprar queso.

description.native_language: Purchase cheese.
description.target_language: Compra queso.

description.native_language: Bring the cheese to Elena at the inn.
description.target_language: Lleva el queso a Elena en la posada.

quest_offer.native_language: We need cheese at the inn. Can you buy some?
quest_offer.target_language: Necesitamos queso en la posada. ¿Puedes comprar algo?

quest_complete.native_language: Perfect, this cheese is just what we needed.
quest_complete.target_language: Perfecto, este queso es justo lo que necesitábamos.

description.native_language: Persuade Lydia to provide herbal tea.
description.target_language: Convence a Lydia para que proporcione té de hierbas.

description.native_language: Visit Lydia at the Herbalist's Hut.
description.target_language: Visita a Lydia en la cabaña del herborista.

description.native_language: Ask Lydia for herbal tea.
description.target_language: Pide a Lydia té de hierbas.

description.native_language: Convince Lydia to help.
description.target_language: Convence a Lydia para que ayude.

quest_offer.native_language: We need Lydia's herbal tea. Can you persuade her?
quest_offer.target_language: Necesitamos el té de hierbas de Lydia. ¿Puedes convencerla?

quest_complete.native_language: Great, Lydia agreed to help!

description.native_language: Deliver water from the Village Entrance to Lina the Guard.
description.target_language: Entrega agua desde la entrada del pueblo a Lina la Guardia.

description.native_language: Collect water at the Village Entrance.
description.target_language: Recoge agua en la entrada del pueblo.

description.native_language: Deliver the water to Lina the Guard.
description.target_language: Entrega el agua a Lina la Guardia.

quest_offer.native_language: Lina needs water. Can you deliver it, please?
quest_offer.target_language: Lina necesita agua. ¿Puedes entregarla, por favor?

quest_complete.native_language: Great, Lina will be happy!

description.native_language: Help Pablo the Child learn about the Sunflower Field.
description.target_language: Ayuda a Pablo el Niño a aprender sobre el Campo de Girasoles.

description.native_language: Talk to Luis the Farmer about the Sunflower Field.
description.target_language: Habla con Luis el Granjero sobre el Campo de Girasoles.

description.native_language: Tell Pablo what you learned about the field.
description.target_language: Dile a Pablo lo que aprendiste sobre el campo.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you find out more about the Sunflower Field for me?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes averiguar más sobre el Campo de Girasoles para mí?

quest_complete.native_language: Wow, that's interesting!

description.native_language: Find the hidden map in Luminara Town Square for Elena the Innkeeper.
description.target_language: Encuentra el mapa escondido en la Plaza de Luminara para Elena la Posadera.

description.native_language: Go to Luminara Town Square.
description.target_language: Ve a la Plaza de Luminara.

description.native_language: Find the hidden map in the square.
description.target_language: Encuentra el mapa escondido en la plaza.

description.native_language: Bring the map to Elena the Innkeeper.
description.target_language: Lleva el mapa a Elena la Posadera.

quest_offer.native_language: There's a hidden map in the town square. Can you find it?
quest_offer.target_language: Hay un mapa escondido en la plaza del pueblo. ¿Puedes encontrarlo?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for the map!

description.native_language: Convince Pablo the Guard to allow Luz the Farmer to access the Festival Grounds.
description.target_language: Convence a Pablo el Guardia para que permita a Luz la Granjera acceder a los Terrenos del Festival.

description.native_language: Talk to Pablo the Guard about Luz's request.
description.target_language: Habla con Pablo el Guardia sobre la petición de Luz.

description.native_language: Convince Pablo to let Luz enter.
description.target_language: Convence a Pablo para que deje entrar a Luz.

description.native_language: Tell Luz the Farmer the good news.
description.target_language: Dile a Luz la Granjera las buenas noticias.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you help me convince Pablo to let me into the Festival Grounds?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes ayudarme a convencer a Pablo para que me deje entrar a los Terrenos del Festival?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for your help!

description.native_language: Make a new friend by helping Carlos the Guard with a small task.
description.target_language: Haz un nuevo amigo ayudando a Carlos el Guardia con una pequeña tarea.

description.native_language: Introduce yourself to Carlos the Guard.
description.target_language: Preséntate a Carlos el Guardia.

description.native_language: Help Carlos with his task at Rainbow Pond.
description.target_language: Ayuda a Carlos con su tarea en el Estanque Arcoíris.

description.native_language: Talk to Carlos about how the task went.
description.target_language: Habla con Carlos sobre cómo fue la tarea.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you help me and maybe become friends?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes ayudarme y tal vez hacernos amigos?

quest_complete.native_language: I'm glad we met!

description.native_language: Discover secrets about the Enchanted Glade from Lydia the Herbalist.
description.target_language: Descubre secretos sobre el Claro Encantado de Lydia la Herbolaria.

description.native_language: Talk to Lydia the Herbalist about the Enchanted Glade.
description.target_language: Habla con Lydia la Herbolaria sobre el Claro Encantado.

description.native_language: Report back what you learned about the glade.
description.target_language: Informa lo que aprendiste sobre el claro.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you learn more about the Enchanted Glade for me?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes aprender más sobre el Claro Encantado para mí?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for the information!

description.native_language: Tom the Merchant needs apples for his store. Can you gather some?
description.target_language: Tom el Comerciante necesita manzanas para su tienda. ¿Puedes recoger algunas?

description.native_language: Gather an apple from the Village Entrance.
description.target_language: Recoge una manzana en la Entrada del Pueblo.

description.native_language: Bring the apple to Tom the Merchant.
description.target_language: Lleva la manzana a Tom el Comerciante.

quest_offer.native_language: Hello! Can you help me gather some apples?
quest_offer.target_language: ¡Hola! ¿Puedes ayudarme a recoger algunas manzanas?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for the apples!

description.native_language: Discover the beauty of Rainbow Pond and find a special flower.
description.target_language: Descubre la belleza del Estanque Arcoíris y encuentra una flor especial.

description.native_language: Travel to the Rainbow Pond.
description.target_language: Viaja al Estanque Arcoíris.

description.native_language: Find the special flower at Rainbow Pond.
description.target_language: Encuentra la flor especial en el Estanque Arcoíris.

quest_offer.native_language: Have you seen the Rainbow Pond? It's very beautiful!
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Has visto el Estanque Arcoíris? ¡Es muy hermoso!

quest_complete.native_language: You found the flower! How lovely!

description.native_language: Lina the Guard needs water. Deliver it to her.
description.target_language: Lina la Guardia necesita agua. Entrégala a ella.

description.native_language: Gather water at the Village Entrance.
description.target_language: Recoge agua en la Entrada del Pueblo.

description.native_language: Deliver the water to Lina the Guard.
description.target_language: Entrega el agua a Lina la Guardia.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you bring this water to Lina?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes llevar esta agua a Lina?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for delivering the water.

description.native_language: Introduce yourself to Pablo and learn about his favorite games.
description.target_language: Preséntate a Pablo y aprende sobre sus juegos favoritos.

description.native_language: Talk to Pablo the Child at Rainbow Pond.
description.target_language: Habla con Pablo el Niño en el Estanque Arcoíris.

quest_offer.native_language: Pablo loves to play games. Why don't you introduce yourself?
quest_offer.target_language: A Pablo le encanta jugar. ¿Por qué no te presentas?

quest_complete.native_language: Nice to meet you! Do you like games too?
quest_complete.target_language: ¡Encantado de conocerte! ¿Te gustan los juegos también?

description.native_language: Find out what the weather will be like for the festival.
description.target_language: Averigua cómo será el tiempo para el festival.

description.native_language: Talk to Elena the Innkeeper at The Cozy Inn for weather information.
description.target_language: Habla con Elena la Posadera en La Posada Acogedora para obtener información del tiempo.

description.native_language: Report back to Miguel the Fruit Seller at Luminara Town Square.
description.target_language: Informa a Miguel el Vendedor de Frutas en la Plaza de Luminara.

quest_offer.native_language: Can you find out what the weather will be like?
quest_offer.target_language: ¿Puedes averiguar cómo será el tiempo?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you! Now we can plan for the festival.

name.native_language: Convince Fiona to Share a Story
name.target_language: Convence a Fiona para Compartir una Historia

description.native_language: Fiona knows many tales. Convince her to share one.
description.target_language: Fiona conoce muchas historias. Convéncela de compartir una.

description.native_language: Talk to Fiona at the Fairy Circle.
description.target_language: Habla con Fiona en el Círculo de Hadas.

description.native_language: Convince Fiona to tell you a story.
description.target_language: Convence a Fiona para que te cuente una historia.

quest_offer.native_language: Fiona has many stories to tell. Can you convince her to share one?
quest_offer.target_language: Fiona tiene muchas historias que contar. ¿Puedes convencerla de compartir una?

quest_complete.native_language: Thank you for the story, Fiona!
